doc:
Charlotte Stewart https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charlotte_Stewart 0 Charlotte Stewart (born February 27, 1941) is an American film and television actress.She is most famous for her role as the schoolmarm 'Miss Beadle' on Little House on the Prairie and her work with director David Lynch.Stewart graduated from the Pasadena Playhouse. Her first acting job was on The Loretta Young Show. She has guest starred on many television series ranging from Bonanza to The Office and the recurring role of Betty Briggs on Twin Peaks. She was also a prolific TV commercial actress. Her notable film appearances include Eraserhead and Tremors. In 1961, with actor Beau Bridges, she also played Agnes Finley, one of the school newspaper editors, on the TV series My Three Sons in the season-one episode "Deadline". In 2016, Stewart self-published her memoirs in a book entitled Little House in the Hollywood Hills. Her_first_acting_job was on The_Loretta_Young_Show . She has guest starred on many_television_series ranging from Bonanza to The_Office and the_recurring_role of Betty_Briggs on Twin_Peaks . She was also a_prolific_TV_commercial_actress . Her_notable_film_appearances include Eraserhead_and_Tremors . In 1961 , with actor_Beau_Bridges , she also played Agnes_Finley , one of the_school_newspaper_editors , on the_TV_series_My_Three_Sons in the_season-one_episode_"_Deadline_" . In 2016 , Stewart self-published her_memoirs in a_book entitled Little_House in the_Hollywood_Hills .
